description: Filesystem-buffered, passthrough stream that buffers indefinitely rather than propagate backpressure from downstream consumers.

name: fs-capacitor

scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:clean && npm run prepare:mjs && npm run prepare:js && npm run prepare:prettier
scripts.test: npm run test:eslint && npm run test:prettier && npm run test:mjs && npm run test:js
scripts.test:mjs: if-ver -lt 12 || exit 0; node --experimental-modules --no-warnings lib/test | tap-mocha-reporter classic
